title: Lynda Barry
description: On this episode cartoonist Lynda Barry talks about learning how to draw, and the damaging effects of one’s own opinion.
itunes:subtitle: On this episode cartoonist Lynda Barry talks about learning how to draw, and the damaging effects of one’s own opinion.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
itunes:author: Debbie Millman
itunes:summary: On this episode cartoonist Lynda Barry talks about learning how to draw, and the damaging effects of one’s own opinion.
content:encoded: On this episode cartoonist Lynda Barry talks about learning how to draw, and the damaging effects of one’s own opinion.
